item.title: Setting up the project part 1
item.description: Setting up the templateTo set up the skeleton of the project I used the day8/re-frame-template library, and I ran the command lein new re-frame haggadah +garden +kondo +github-actions +cider +10x +re-frisk +routes. This generated a base for my application, including the libraries listed in the +name portion of the command. For more information on each of these libraries, click here.

item.title: Creating my blog
item.description: IntroductionHello everyone. My name is Eitan and this is a blog about my experience with making a cljs application. The following posts will document my steps in setting up the application, and making the various features. I hope you gain something out of viewing my journey of making an application.
